title: Socail Media Clone
description: A small clone of a social media platform that allows users to share posts and interact with other users.

title: Movies Sentiment Analysis
description: Using React as frontend and node.js as backend to analyze the sentiment of the movie reviews on imdb ny scraping them and using a machine learning model to predict the sentiment.

title: Pocket Market
description: An innovative e-commerce mobile app built using Flutter for a seamless frontend experience. Pocket Market offers users a smooth and responsive shopping experience, product browsing, and real-time data updates.

title: Task Flow
description: Each day the admin refrech the tasks and the users can see the tasks and take it and when they finish it they can mark it as done.

title: Book Trading Website
description: A website that allows users to trade books with each other. Users can add their book to listing with their contact info.
